name: cmetmeti

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1))
-| wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈(Met ` c1)
⊣ c0 ∈(CMet ` c1)
⊣ (c0 ∈(CMet ` c1)→ c0 ∈(Met ` c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1))
-| wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈(Met ` c1)
⊣ c0 ∈(CMet ` c1)
⊣ (c0 ∈(CMet ` c1)→ c0 ∈(Met ` c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1))
-| wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1))

comment: A complete metric space is a metric space. (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-2007.)
